Html: Does anyone know how to make a class that implements IWaveProvider with the ability to change the speed and pitch of the music you play?

I use soundtouch.net (https://soundtouchdotnet.codeplex.com/) for changing pitch. you can use the wdl resampler to change playbackrate (pitch & speed) - combine with soundtouch and you can modify speed only.
I blogged about using SoundTouch with NAudio here: http://markheath.net/post/varispeed-naudio-soundtouch
